annotations.APPROVED: Approved for use according to license requirements
annotations.NEEDS-APPROVAL: Needs legal approval for product or service usage, ok for internal use.
annotations.NEEDS-IP-LEGAL-REVIEW: License needs review by IP legal team for usage determination
annotations.NO-SPDX-ID: No SPDX ID exists for license.
annotations.AGPL-WARNING: Cant be linked in any way (no static or dynamic linking) to product code. Any interaction needs to be at arms length through the command line or other system level interaction. This will need your executives approval, so be sure to connect with your release manager or squad leader as soon as you identify the need to use this license.
annotations.GPL-LINK-WARNING: Cant be linked in any way (no static or dynamic linking) to product code. Any interaction needs to be at arms length through the command line or other system level interaction. This will need your executives approval, so be sure to connect with your release manager or squad leader as soon as you identify the need to use this license.
annotations.LGPL-LINK-WARNING: Only dynamic linking is allowed to product code. This license needs management approval.
annotations.CC-BY-SAAS: SaaS usage of CC-BY 2.0/2.5 /3.0/4.0 license, will no longer require a notice with a URI linking to the full text of the CC-BY license and download location.
annotations.CC-BY-ON-PREM: For on-premise distribution of CC-BY, the primary requirement of providing notice and SLC still applies.
annotations.CDLA-PERMISSIVE: The CDLA Sharing license is preferred for data contributions, but the CDLA permissive can also be approved.
annotations.CDLA-SHARING: This is the preferred license for data contributions, and is also acceptable for use in products and services.
annotations.NEEDS-LEGAL-REVIEW-PII: The legal review ensures privacy, personal information, and other aspects specific to data are reviewed.
annotations.NEEDS-LEGAL-REVIEW-GPL: Needs legal review to assure GPL requirements are met.
